description.value:
The King of the Green is the god of the hunt and wild places. Cattoron commands and keeps those who live respectfully within his wilderness.

Edicts: Protect forests and other natural areas, advocate for animals and plants, take and commit to decisive actions.

Anathema: Take advantage of the conveniences of society, enable the destruction of wilderness, needlessly kill animals.

Areas of Concern: Wild places, the frontier.
